segments.text: I observe the woman, diligently drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is absolute, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kitchen is slowly transforming into a watery disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water cascading from the sink is rather disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just wasteful, and creating such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is standing directly in the deepening puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, her expression remains utterly neutral, unperturbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly perplexing how she remains so oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of detachment is honestly quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets, I'm sure of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark example of tunnel vision, taken to an extreme.
segments.speaker: PAR
